name: tron-grpc
description: A TypeScript client for interacting with the TRON blockchain via gRPC

scripts.build: npm run clean && tsc --project tsconfig.json && npm run copy-proto && npm run minify
scripts.copy-proto: mkdir -p dist/src/proto/contract && find src/proto -maxdepth 1 -name '*.proto' -exec cp {} dist/src/proto/ \; && cp src/proto/contract/*.proto dist/src/proto/contract/
